Literature.Title: Lantibiotics from Geobacillus thermodenitrificans.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2012;109:5241-5246
Literature.Author: Garg N, Tang W, Goto Y, Nair SK, van der Donk WA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus dysgalactiae subsp. dysgalactiae ATCC 27957(IC50=0.69±0.05µM),Streptococcus dysgalactiae subsp. dysgalactiae ATCC 27957(IC90=0.87µM),Enterococcus faecium CNRZ 481(IC50=0.84±0.05µM),Enterococcus faecium CNRZ 481(IC90=1.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus(IC50=2.23±0.03µM),Staphylococcus aureus(IC90=3.39µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 7702(IC50=0.49±0.02µM),Bacillus anthracis Sterne 7702(IC90=0.71µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(IC50=0.55±0.01µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(IC90=0.81µM),Lactococcus lactis HP ATCC 11602(IC50=0.12±0.09µM),Lactococcus lactis HP ATCC 11602(IC90=0.13µM)
